price: 2. Yallaa kee kay farmoyta nummayse maraw! Xaganay duuduse waytoonu waytaanaa kee hinnay abinat asse waytoonu waytan maxco macah ittaanaa?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā tafʿalūna
